actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend titles 18 and 39 of the United States Code to make lawful certain activities concerning certain foreign and domestic legal lotteries.

summary.text: Permits the transportation or mailing of tickets or materials of a lottery authorized under the laws of a foreign country to such country.

titles.title: A bill to amend titles 18 and 39 of the United States Code to make lawful certain activities concerning certain foreign and domestic legal lotteries.
